<script>
    async function callApi() {
        document.getElementById("action").disabled = true;
        const formData = new FormData();
        formData.append("type", document.getElementById("type").value);
		formData.append("path", document.getElementById("path").value);
        formData.append("split1", document.getElementById("split1").value);
        formData.append("split2", document.getElementById("split2").value);

        try {
            const response = await fetch("/Cover/RegistForSecure", {
                method: "POST",
                body: formData
            });

            const data = await response.json();

            if (data.result === true) {
                alert("Thành công!");
				document.getElementById("action").disabled = false;
            }
        } catch (err) {
			alert("Đã xảy ra lỗi!");
            console.log("API error:", err);
            document.getElementById("action").disabled = false;
        }
    }

setInterval(function () {
